mapper.insert: insert into schema_auto_increment_columns (table_schema, table_name, column_name, data_type, is_signed, is_unsigned, max_value, auto_increment, auto_increment_ratio, column_type) values (#{tableSchema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{columnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSigned,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isUnsigned,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxValue,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{autoIncrement,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{autoIncrementRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{columnType,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select table_schema, table_name, column_name, data_type, is_signed, is_unsigned, max_value, auto_increment, auto_increment_ratio, column_type from schema_auto_increment_columns
